DESCRIPTION: Triggers whenever this card kills an enemy of any type.
When you have 10 #yUltimate #yCharge, lose all #yUltimate #yCharge and trigger this effect.
Effective when the target is below #b50% HP.
Receives #b30% less damage. Reduced by 1 when taken unblocked damage.
This card is not transformed when #yDuplicating.
At the start of turn, up to #b6 #ySticky #yBombs explode one by one dealing damage equal to the number of #ySticky #yBombs remaining.
Immediately restart your turn as another character, gain [E] until you have 3, draw cards until you have 5, and transform your relics and cards. Lasts until end of turn.
A relic that draws a card whenever you have no cards in hand during your turn.
